articles.title: Google brings Gemini mobile app to India with nine Indian language support - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google has released the Gemini mobile app in India with support for nine Indian languages, over four months after its debut in the U.S.
articles.content:
Google has released its dedicated AI mobile app Gemini in India over four months after its debut in the U.S.  with support for nine Indian languages alongside English.
The Gemini mobile app in India… [+1835 chars]

articles.title: Don't Miss the Strawberry Moon in June's Night Sky! - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Next Full Moon is the Strawberry Moon; the Flower, Hot, Hoe, or Planting Moon; the Mead or Honey Moon; the Rose Moon; Vat Purnima; Poson Poya; and the LRO Moon. On June 21, 2024, the full "Strawberry Moon" will be visible, marked by various cultural celeb…
